程序包 aaafcKeyManage.PairingDemo

接口 BilinearPairingEngine

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BasicIdentEngine
    public interface BilinearPairingEngine
    This interface is for organize overall structure
    for Pairing-based algorithms.
    A successful implementation is shown as below:

    BilinearPairingEngine example = new A();
    example.init(param1, plainMessage);
    example.doProcess();
    PairingLog log = example.extractPairingLog();

    And an Object "log" is generated for further extraction.

    作者:
    aaafc

    • 方法概要

      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void doProcess()
      Do the whole process for the engine object
      PairingLog extractPairingLog()
      Extract a PairingLog object which stores the data for the operation.
      void init​(PairingCurveParam curveParam, java.lang.String plainMessage)
      Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.
      void init​(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.PairingParameters parameters, java.lang.String plainMessage)
      Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.
      void init​(java.lang.String parameterPath, java.lang.String plainMessage)
      Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        void init​(it.unisa.dia.gas.jpbc.PairingParameters parameters,
          java.lang.String plainMessage)
        Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.
        参数:
        parameters - A PairingParameters object which defines the curve.
        plainMessage - A String represent the plain message.

      • init

        void init​(java.lang.String parameterPath,
          java.lang.String plainMessage)
        Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.
        参数:
        parameterPath - A String which defines the path to the file
        which stores the parameter for the curve.
        plainMessage - A String represent the plain message.

      • init

        void init​(PairingCurveParam curveParam,
          java.lang.String plainMessage)
        Initialize the engine by PairingParameters object.
        参数:
        curveParam - A PairingCurveParam object which store the parameters
        to generate a PairingParameters object.
        plainMessage - A String represent the plain message.

      • doProcess

        void doProcess()
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Do the whole process for the engine object
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • extractPairingLog

        PairingLog extractPairingLog()
                      throws LoggingException
        Extract a PairingLog object which stores the data for the operation.
        返回:
        A PairingLog object
        抛出:
        LoggingException
